name: Fraughashar
description: Fraughashar is a small fey characterized by its cunning nature and affinity for icy terrains. It has a dexterous build and moves gracefully over snow and ice.
memorable: Its ability to walk on ice without hindrance and its tactical use of cold spells make it a formidable foe in icy environments.
goals: To deceive and ambush adventurers in icy terrain, exploiting its agile nature.
relations: May be found in the company of other fey creatures or ice elementals, serving them or acting independently.
environment: Icy terrains, such as snowy mountains or frozen forests.
strengths: High agility and specialized movement in icy environments, along with damage immunity to cold.
weaknesses: Low strength and charisma, making it vulnerable in direct confrontations.
attacks: Utilizes bite and dagger attacks, combined with a potent frost bolt that deals cold damage from a distance.
most_powerful_ability: Frost Bolt, a ranged spell attack that deals significant cold damage.
equipment: Leather armor and a shield for enhanced defense.
senses: Possesses a moderate passive perception of 10.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, allowing it to hide effectively.
additional_information: Has advantage on saving throws against being knocked prone while on ice.
Good defense with an AC of 15.
Can evade threats easily due to its high Dexterity.
Relatively low health with only 22 hit points, making it fragile.
The clever use of environment and speed provides tactical advantages.
spellcasting: Can cast Frost Bolt, which deals cold damage.
test_queries: small cunning fey creature on ice
cold immune fey that attacks with frost bolt
agile small monster that lives in icy terrains
ice walker fey that avoids being knocked prone
